scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ext js,ts,json,env --exec "node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm src/main.ts"
scripts.dev:agent: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ext js,ts,json,env --exec "node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm src/agent/index.ts"
scripts.script:test-purchase-token: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ext js,ts,json,env --exec "node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm src/test-purchase-token.ts"
scripts.script:test-portfolio: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ext js,ts,json,env --exec "node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm src/test-portfolio.ts"
scripts.script:test-full-system: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ext js,ts,json,env --exec "node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/fullSystemTest.ts"
scripts.help:
echo "

Available commands: 
- start: Start the bot
- dev: Start the bot in development mode (cross-platform)
- windev: Start the bot in development mode (Windows)
- update:db: Update the database types
- build: Build the bot
- clean: Cleans the build files
- lint: Lint the code
- format: Format the code
- test: Runs code tests
- system-test: Run full system integration test
- deploy: Deploys to GCP (App Engine)
- help: Show this message

"
